SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, READ_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(B_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END B_CREATE_DATE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKE L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
(SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
